document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.levels: 9{{th}}+The adventure is recommended for characters with more than 250,000 xp. In 2{{nd}} edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'', level advancement occurs at different xp values for different classes. The "slowest" class category in the [[Player's Handbook 2nd edition (revised)|revised 2{{nd}} edition ''Player's Handbook'']] is the Warrior (encompassing the Fighter, Paladin, and Ranger classes), which reaches level 9 at exactly 250,000 xp.
